Commentary.ab: VrS25.21a āiiese yešti vīspaēibiiō aṣ̌ahe ratubiiō ...] vīspe aṣ̌ahe ratauuō āiiese 4200, 4210, 4240. Err. for dative analogical to VrS2.21 (and parallels) with āiiese yešti + accusative. Ms. 4240 joins it with yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe raϑβō dātahe (VrS25.29). Mss. 4200, 4210 abv. with Pahl. OD (Vid. Recitation Instruction).

RecitationInstruction.ab: VVrS25.21a āiiese yešti vīspaēibiiō ...] vīspe aṣ̌ahe ratauuō āiiese OD yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō (VVrS25.29) 4200, 4210; vīspaēibiiō aēibiiō ratubiiō OD yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō 4220, 4280, 4370.
